name: Research Participation
description: Credit course for supervised participation in a faculty research project. Offered only when a full-time faculty member from the Centre for Criminology & Sociolegal Studies is willing and available to supervise. Consult the program website for additional information. Not eligible for CR/NCR option.
department: Centre for Criminology and Sociolegal Studies
prerequisites: 9 FCEs. A CGPA of at least 3.0 is recommended. Approval of the Program Coordinator.
